DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether possible improve health outcome patient Type II diabetes , community-based health care agency offer care coordination half study group family practice office . The intervention include assess patient ' status use two instrument : depression screen ( PHQ9 ) motivation change scale ( Patient Activation Measure , PAM ) . A masters-level social worker counsel patient intervention group . Changes patient ' health status , PHQ9 score PAM score one year measure . Outcomes compare study group group without intervention .
DOC.brief_title: SeaCare 's Care Coordination Diabetes Management Primary Care Office
